mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (price, accountId, title, contents, status, istrade, createtime, updatetime, deliveryprice, dibcount ) VALUES (#{price}, #{accountId}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{status}, #{istrade}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{deliveryprice}, #{dibcount})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET price = #{price}, title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, status = #{status}, istrade = #{istrade}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, deliveryprice = #{deliveryprice}, dibcount = #{dibcount} WHERE id = #{id}
